6.63: Increased base attack damage from 27-37 to 32-42 (total attack damage is now 46-56).  Geminate Attack Now works against buildings. Increased max distance from 900 to 1300.
6.61: Watchers replaced with Urna Swarm. Urna Swarm:
6.40: Watchers Reduced manacost from 25 to 10. Reduced cooldown from 30/25/20/15 to 20/15/10/5.
6.41: Watchers can no longer block neutral creeps from spawning.
6.64: When having multiple Scarabs selected, casting Infestation now causes the highlighted Scarab to use it, instead of all selected Scarabs simultaniously.
6.42: Watchers Are no longer spell immune. Reduced gold bounty from 20-25 to 10-13
6.03: Watchers Increased max allowed Watchers from 1/1/2/2 to 1/2/3/4. Increased Watcher duration from 30/60/60/infinite to infinite on each level. Increased cooldown from 30 to 90.
6.07: Fixed some memory leak issues with  Time Lapse.
6.67: Removed from Captain's Mode. Replaced Urna Swarm with  The Swarm
6.67c: Non-hero units now require 8 hits to destroy  The Swarm beetles, instead of 4 (heroes still need 4).
6.33: Watchers Increased corpse search radius from 300 to 600. Increased movement speed from 350 to 522.
6.32: Watchers No longer dies whenever Weaver dies. Increased vision from 1800/800 to 1800/1800.
6.35: Increased base attack damage from 17-27 to 27-37 (total attack damage is now 41-51).
6.34: Watchers Increased max allowed Watchers from 1/2/3/4 to 1/2/4/6. Reduced cooldown from 90 to 60.
6.39: Increased  Shukuchi damage from 90 on each level to 90/100/110/120. Reduced  Geminate Attack cooldown from 7/6/5/4 to 7/6/5/3.5. Reduced  Time Lapse manacost from 150 on each level to 150/75/0.
6.38: Increased attack range from 400 to 225. Increased base armor from -1 to 0 (total armor is now 1.96). Watchers Increased max allowed Watchers from 1/2/4/6 to 2/4/6/8. Reduced manacost from 50 to 25. Reduced cooldown from 60 on each level to 30/25/20/15.
6.68: The Swarm Reduced vision from 500 to 250. Increased manacost from 75 to 100.
6.79: Increased Base Attack Time from 1.7 to 1.8.
6.52: Reduced  Time Lapse cooldown from 120/90/60 to 60/50/40.
6.50: Reduced  Geminate Attack cooldown fron 7/6/5/3.5 to 6/5/4/2.5.
6.75: Reduced  The Swarm attack interval from 1.5 to 1.35.
6.76: Increased base attack damage from 27-37 to 32-42 (total attack damage is now 50-60).
6.70: Added to Captain's Mode. Increased  The Swarm vision from 250 to 321.
6.72: Reduced base armor from 0 to -1 (total armor is now 0.96). Reduced  The Swarm damage from 21/24/27/30 to 15/20/25/30.
6.02: Reduced  strength gain from 2.5 to 1.9.  Shukuchi Rescaled damage from 25/50/75/100 to 90 on each level. Increased cooldown from 9 on each level to 13/11/9/7. Increased  Geminate Attack max proc distance from 450 to 900. Fixed  Time Lapse not going on cooldown when used.
6.33b: Fixed some spell interactions with Watchers. Fixed  Time Lapse not giving Weaver back its own manacost after cast.
6.82: Increased  The Swarm duration from 8/12/16/20 to 14/16/18/20.  Shukuchi No longer ignore invisible units Reduced damage from 90/110/130/150 to 75/100/125/150.  Geminate Attack Can now proc item effects just like regular attacks. Increased cooldown from 6/5/4/2.5 to 6/5/4/3.
6.84: The Swarm no longer ignores ancient creeps, Roshan and creep-heroes. Rescaled damage over time from 15/20/25/30 to 20 on each level. Rescaled damage interval from 1.35 on each level to 1.4/1.25/1.1/0.95. Rescaled duration from 14/16/18/20 to 16 on each level.  Geminate Attack No longer has a max distance limit of 1300 range. Now launches the second attack 0.25 seconds after the first attack, instead of only when the first attack hits the target. Added  Aghanim's Scepter upgrade for Weaver: Reduces  Time Lapse cooldown from 60/50/40 to 20 on each level and allows targeting allied heroes with it.
6.20: Increased  Geminate Attack cooldown from 6/5/4/3 to 7/6/5/4.
6.28: Increased base  strength from 14 to 15. Watchers Reduced health from 75 to 1. Are now spell immune.
